### Request for Information (RFI) - Scheduling Tool
#### Reference Number: PW-22-01005848
#### Solicitation Number: J058497/A

#### Notice Type
**request for information**
#### Tender Status
This RFI has expired.

#### Contracting Entity Information
[Statistics Canada](http://www.statcan.gc.ca) is soliciting responses to this RFI.

#### End User Entities Information
The end user entities for this RFI are [Statistics Canada](http://www.statcan.gc.ca) located at 150 Tunney's Pasture Driveway, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0T6.

#### Contact Information
The person responsible for this RFI is Shuo Chen. The contact's email address is [shuo.chen@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:shuo.chen@statcan.gc.ca), the contact's phone number is (343) 573-8056 and the contact's address is the same as the end user entity mentioned above.

#### Description of RFI
Statistics Canada is issuing this RFI to gain a better understanding of the availability in the marketplace of scheduling software for employees and projects.

Statistics Canada seeks information regarding the availability of software that enables the simple and effective scheduling of employees across time zones and projects. Particular interest is taken in receiving information from suppliers that can demonstrate the ability to schedule employees by project and that can display a flexible dynamic software capable of adapting to change.

The RFI must be received by email at the destination email address identified and by the date and time below:

* Email: [statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca)
* Date: September 27, 2022 (14:00 EDT)

#### Attachments
There are two attachments to this RFI. The attachments are the solicitation documents in English and French.

Please visit [canadabuys.canada.ca/documents](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents) to view the attachments.

This RFI can be found on the [MERX site](http://merx.com). You will need to log in to view the RFI and the attachments. If you have any questions, please call the contact listed above. end of notification. end of message. ```
